author: Jim Morrison
content: A friend is someone who gives you total freedom to be yourself.

author: Jim Morrison
content: Friends can help each other. A true friend is someone who lets you have total freedom to be yourself - and especially to feel. Or, not feel. Whatever you happen to be feeling at the moment is fine with them. That's what real love amounts to - letting a person be what he really is.

author: Jim Morrison
content: People fear death even more than pain. It's strange that they fear death. Life hurts a lot more than death. At the point of death, the pain is over. Yeah, I guess it is a friend.

author: Jim Morrison
content: There are things known and things unknown and in between are the doors.

author: Jim Morrison
content: Expose yourself to your deepest fear; after that, fear has no power, and the fear of freedom shrinks and vanishes. You are free.

author: Jim Morrison
content: The most important kind of freedom is to be what you really are. You trade in your reality for a role. You give up your ability to feel, and in exchange, put on a mask.

author: Jim Morrison
content: Whoever controls the media, controls the mind.

author: Jim Morrison
content: I like people who shake other people up and make them feel uncomfortable.

author: Jim Morrison
content: Where's your will to be weird?

author: Jim Morrison
content: It's like gambling somehow. You go out for a night of drinking and you don't know where your going to end up the next day. It could work out good or it could be disastrous. It's like the throw of the dice.

author: Jim Morrison
content: Some of the worst mistakes of my life have been haircuts.

author: Jim Morrison
content: This is the strangest life I've ever known.

author: Jim Morrison
content: Violence isn't always evil. What's evil is the infatuation with violence.

author: Jim Morrison
content: Death makes angels of us all and gives us wings where we had shoulders smooth as ravens claws.

author: Jim Morrison
content: Hatred is a very underestimated emotion.

author: Jim Morrison
content: Actually I don't remember being born, it must have happened during one of my black outs.

author: Jim Morrison
content: I see myself as an intelligent, sensitive human, with the soul of a clown which forces me to blow it at the most important moments.

author: Jim Morrison
content: Listen, real poetry doesn't say anything; it just ticks off the possibilities. Opens all doors. You can walk through any one that suits you.

author: Jim Morrison
content: When you make your peace with authority, you become authority.

author: Jim Morrison
content: We fear violence less than our own feelings. Personal, private, solitary pain is more terrifying than what anyone else can inflict.

author: Jim Morrison
content: I am interested in anything about revolt, disorder, chaos-especially activity that seems to have no meaning. It seems to me to be the road toward freedom... Rather than starting inside, I start outside and reach the mental through the physical.

author: Jim Morrison
content: Sex is full of lies. The body tries to tell the truth. But, it's usually too battered with rules to be heard, and bound with pretenses so it can hardly move. We cripple ourselves with lies.

author: Jim Morrison
content: Love cannot save you from your own fate.

author: Jim Morrison
content: I believe in a long, prolonged, derangement of the senses in order to obtain the unknown.

author: Jim Morrison
content: The most loving parents and relatives commit murder with smiles on their faces. They force us to destroy the person we really are: a subtle kind of murder.

author: Jim Morrison
content: Music inflames temperament.

author: Jim Rohn
content: Happiness is not something you postpone for the future; it is something you design for the present.

author: Jim Rohn
content: Take care of your body. It's the only place you have to live.

author: Jim Rohn
content: Discipline is the bridge between goals and accomplishment.

author: Jim Rohn
content: Either you run the day or the day runs you.

author: Jim Rohn
content: If you don't like how things are, change it! You're not a tree.

author: Jim Rohn
content: We must all suffer one of two things: the pain of discipline or the pain of regret or disappointment.

author: Jim Rohn
content: If you are not willing to risk the unusual, you will have to settle for the ordinary.

author: Jim Rohn
content: The walls we build around us to keep sadness out also keeps out the joy.

author: Jim Rohn
content: Learning is the beginning of wealth. Learning is the beginning of health. Learning is the beginning of spirituality. Searching and learning is where the miracle process all begins.

author: Jim Rohn
content: Whatever good things we build end up building us.

author: Jim Rohn
content: Take advantage of every opportunity to practice your communication skills so that when important occasions arise, you will have the gift, the style, the sharpness, the clarity, and the emotions to affect other people.

author: Jim Rohn
content: Success is nothing more than a few simple disciplines, practiced every day.

author: Jim Rohn
content: If you don't design your own life plan, chances are you'll fall into someone else's plan. And guess what they have planned for you? Not much.

author: Jim Rohn
content: You must take personal responsibility. You cannot change the circumstances, the seasons, or the wind, but you can change yourself. That is something you have charge of.

author: Jim Rohn
content: Affirmation without discipline is the beginning of delusion.

author: Jim Rohn
content: Maturity is the ability to reap without apology and not complain when things don't go well.

author: Jim Rohn
content: You cannot change your destination overnight, but you can change your direction overnight.

author: Jim Rohn
content: Effective communication is 20% what you know and 80% how you feel about what you know.

author: Jim Rohn
content: Formal education will make you a living; self-education will make you a fortune.

author: Jim Rohn
content: Let others lead small lives, but not you. Let others argue over small things, but not you. Let others cry over small hurts, but not you. Let others leave their future in someone else's hands, but not you.

author: Jim Rohn
content: The more you know the less you need to say.

author: Jim Rohn
content: If you go to work on your goals, your goals will go to work on you. If you go to work on your plan, your plan will go to work on you. Whatever good things we build end up building us.

author: Jim Rohn
content: The few who do are the envy of the many who only watch.

author: Jim Rohn
content: Don't wish it were easier, wish you were better.

author: Jim Rohn
content: Success is neither magical nor mysterious. Success is the natural consequence of consistently applying the basic fundamentals.

author: Jim Rohn
content: Failure is not a single, cataclysmic event. You don't fail overnight. Instead, failure is a few errors in judgement, repeated every day.

author: Jim Valvano
content: My father gave me the greatest gift anyone could give another person, he believed in me.

author: Jim Valvano
content: I will thank God for the day and the moment I have.

author: Jim Valvano
content: If you laugh, you think, and you cry, that's a full day. That's a heck of a day. You do that seven days a week, you're going to have something special.

author: Jim Valvano
content: And if you see me, smile and maybe give me a hug. That's important to me too.

author: Jim Valvano
content: Be a dreamer. If you don't know how to dream, you're dead.

author: Jim Valvano
content: How do you go from where you are to where you wanna be? And I think you have to have an enthusiasm for life. You have to have a dream, a goal. And you have to be willing to work for it.
